scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:rust:wasm: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg/web && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg/node
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt
scripts.lint:python: cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .
scripts.lint:python:fix: cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'

BLUESKY_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables the BlueSky plugin.

BLUESKY_DRY_RUN.description: Enables or disables dry run mode when interacting with BlueSky; when true, operations are simulated but not executed.

BLUESKY_HANDLE.description: The BlueSky handle (username) for the agent account.

BLUESKY_PASSWORD.description: The app password for authentication with BlueSky.

BLUESKY_MAX_POST_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in a BlueSky post.

BLUESKY_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in seconds for BlueSky operations such as fetching new notifications.

BLUESKY_ENABLE_POSTING.description: Enables or disables the ability to post to BlueSky.

BLUESKY_POST_INTERVAL_MIN.description: Minimum interval in seconds between automated posts.

BLUESKY_POST_INTERVAL_MAX.description: Maximum interval in seconds between automated posts.

BLUESKY_ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING.description: Turns on or off automated action processing for BlueSky events.

BLUESKY_ACTION_INTERVAL.description: Interval in seconds between action-processing cycles.

BLUESKY_POST_IMMEDIATELY.description: If true, posts are published immediately instead of waiting for a schedule.

BLUESKY_MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING.description: Maximum number of BlueSky actions to process in a single batch.

BLUESKY_ENABLE_DMS.description: Enable processing of direct messages via the chat.bsky API.
